data.title: Casper's Halloween Special (1979)
data.meta_description: On Halloween night, Hairy Scarey, Winifred Witch and Screech Ghost are plotting their mean-spirited spookings. Casper refuses to join them and decides to go trick-or-treating dressed as a real boy, but neighborhood kids see through his disguise and run away in fear. Casper is heartbroken until he meets a special group of orphans who accept him for who he is, a ghost. But their fun is soon spoiled as Hairy Scary and his ghostly crew interfere. Now it is up to Casper and his new friends to stop their ghastly games and save Halloween before it is too late. --Wikipedia
data.text:
"Halloween is the most when you play like a ghost and you're going trick-or-treat!"

Ah! What a blast from the past and I remember watching this recorded on a VHS tape from a TV broadcast when I was really young. Every Halloween season with my grandparents we would watch this one.

Casper is so cute with his little red hat and glasses trying to blend in. He really is the friendly ghost!

I watched this on Boomerang.

This is from Hanna Barbera in 1979 and was one of 3 Hanna Barbera Casper Projects.

My favorite is Casper and the Angels which is a 26/13 episode series (depending on how you count) where Casper is the mascot to two lady space cops as they solve mysteries. This is not currently available, but should be. Boomerang, HBO Max, VOD, I'm not overly choosy, I just want it.

The next best one is Casper's First Christmas which features Yogi Bear and the Gang. This is what I had intended to watch when I pushed play. I forgot it was a Christmas special.

Casper's Halloween Specail has downtrodden Casper teaming up with downtrodden orphans.

All of the HB Casper things feature Hairy Scarey, but none of them feature any of Casper's friends from Harvey Comics.

Beyond the various Hanna Barbera sounds and whatnot, this isn't very fun.
